ygData.subject: Re: Quick question re: choices of primary & secondary w eapons
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/13/99 10:32:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time, Michael.Garramone@cox.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/13/99 10:32:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Michael.Garramone@... writes:

<< Personally I don't like being "ordered" to do anything in a group, by
leader
or other members. They do not play a bard, therefore they can not know all
of our benefits to a party. If the group asks and we agree on a strategy,
no problem. but if it pisses you off like it does me to be ordered around,
just tell them "next time you tell me to play that song will be the last
time i play it." usually that shuts them up, especially if it is the mana
song =) >>

I know , i hate this too . its my biggest pet peeve when someone getting
their butt whipped by a were bat , starts yelling "heal song ....HEAL SONG"
etc.. it gets so aggravating , i have to explain after that it wouldn't do
much for them even if i did sing it. I usually leave a group if they do that
, i get too annoyed .
